homepage-description: This is the landing page of our application.

landing.description: Promptly helps you practice speaking, writing, reading, and listening in the language of your choice—powered by AI.
landing.subtitle-1: Free to use during early access ✨
landing.subtitle-2: No tutors, no scheduling. Practice anytime, anywhere.

login.privacy-policy: By continuing, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

speaking.title: Speaking Practice
speaking.description: Practice your speaking skills with AI-generated prompts.

writing.title: Writing Practice
writing.description: Improve your writing with daily practice sessions.
